answers.questionText: "You have been given a dataset containing information about customers of an e-commerce website, including their purchase history, demographic data, and website activity. Your task is to develop a machine learning model that predicts which customers are most likely to make a purchase in the next month. Describe the steps you would take to approach this problem, from preprocessing the data to evaluating model performance. Also, explain how you would ensure that your model is not overfitting and how you would interpret the model's predictions."?
answers.answerText: I have been given a dataset containing information about customers of an e-commerce website, including their purchase history, demographic data, and website activity. Your task is to develop a machine learning model that predicts which customers are most likely to make a purchase in the next month. i'll test model overfitting by testing same model on different dataset it was trained on

answers.questionText: In the context of machine learning, which algorithm is most suitable for predicting housing prices based on features like the number of bedrooms, area, and location?
True or False: In the context of machine learning, it is best practice to use the same dataset for both training and testing your model to ensure the best performance.?
